itemDescription: British schoolteacher, academic and Conservative Life Peer (1929-2004)

wikipedia_page.main: Heather Brigstocke, Baroness Brigstocke CBE (2 September 1929 – 30 April 2004) was a British schoolteacher, academic and Conservative Life Peer.

response: |Hugh GriffithsHusband of Heather Brigstocke, Baroness Brigstocke.
* Heather Brigstocke, Baroness Brigstocke (1929–2004), British schoolteacher, academic and peer
*Heather Brigstocke, Baroness Brigstocke, 74, British educator and life peer.
